backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, phone-to-principal lookup, presence, and call signaling with access control checks and stored maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module building a phone-to-principal map from old userProfiles and returning a new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, features, components, and test IDs for call-flow and callee lookup updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing high-level summaries for all major frontend modules and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup gating, loading states, and rendering the primary layout.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout and query cache reset.
frontend/src/features/branding/FoscoBran: Branding component displaying the FOSCO logo and wordmark in small or large formats.
frontend/src/features/call/CallSurface.t: Manages call UI states, binds WebRTC streams to video elements, and wires answer/end/mute/camera actions based on call status.
frontend/src/features/call/InCallControl: Renders buttons for mute, camera toggle, and ending a call using passed-in handlers and state flags.
frontend/src/features/call/IncomingCallP: Displays an incoming call card with caller info and answer/decline actions.
frontend/src/features/call/OutgoingCallP: Provides UI to enter a phone number, look up a callee, and initiate a call with status handling.
frontend/src/features/call/useCalleeLook: Looks up a user by phone number via backend actor calls, returning principal, profile, and availability.
frontend/src/features/call/useWebRTCCall: Implements WebRTC call setup, signaling, media initialization, and connection state handling with hooks.
frontend/src/features/layout/FacetimeOve: Provides a styled fixed-position container for displaying the call interface with size variants.
frontend/src/features/layout/FoscoLayout: Main app layout combining header, movie window, call overlay, call controls, and fullscreen logic.
frontend/src/features/layout/MovieWindow: Displays a screen-share video or placeholder and supports fullscreen toggling during calls.
frontend/src/features/layout/useFullscre: Hook managing entering, exiting, and tracking browser fullscreen state for a given element.
frontend/src/features/profile/PhoneNumbe: Form card for entering and saving initial caller profile with name and phone number using save profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileDia: Dialog for viewing and editing existing caller profile, preloading data and saving updates.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/Screen: UI controls for starting or stopping screen sharing with error display.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/useScr: Hook managing screen share stream, permissions, backend enable/disable calls, and error handling.
Button that shares the app URL using Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instance tied to identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvailability.ts: Marks user available or unavailable based on mount and page visibility using actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving caller user profile via actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth client, identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for call status polling, call actions, signaling, and screen cast mutations using actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function that merges conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended OKLCH theme variables, custom animations, and plugins.
